name: Planet Jumper (GameFactory2021)
description:
Bit by bit you have to explore the different planets of our solar system through a combination of levels and endless runners. Coins, trampolines, dangerous falling platforms and moving platforms are waiting for you along the way.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Planned features:

-shop with accessories, new players and defence items

-aliens as an opponents

-multiplayer

-minigames

-and much more...

 

 Controls:

Android: use the touchscreen

Windows: Use A and D to move, SPACE to Jump and ESCAPE to pause the game

Would you like to report a bug, give me suggestions for new content or do you need help?

Then feel free to contact me at the following email: planetjumperservice@gmail.com

 

Attention: The game currently only has a German version! But you can also easily play the game although it´s in German, everything should be clear.

I would be so glad if you leave a little financial support before downloading my game. 

I´m only 16 years old and working on Planet Jumper over 6 months now. With your tip you support to finance a Google Play version, all my hard wok and many new updates to this game. Thank you so much!
